articles.title: "BJP Will Fall To 50 If...": Nitish Kumar On 2024 Ahead Of Delhi Visit
articles.description: BJP MP and Nitish Kumar's former deputy Sushil Kumar Modi says JDU will collapse in Bihar as well. On its national prospects, he adds, "Posters and hoardings do not make anyone the Prime Minister."
articles.content:
Nitish Kumar at the JDU office in Patna, where the party is holding its executive meetings.
New Delhi: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar today said the BJP "will come down to 50 seats" in the 2024 e… [+3020 chars]

articles.title: Sharad Pawar's Advice To Eknath Shinde Over Dussehra Rally Venue
articles.description: Nationalist Congress Party chief Sharad Pawar on Saturday advised Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde to avoid a face-off over the annual Dussehra rally of the Shiv Sena.
articles.content:
A Chief Minister should avoid confrontation and take everyone along, said Sharad Pawar. (File)

articles.title: Student, 3 others shot at in Rohtak’s MDU campus
articles.description: The injured were admitted to a private hospital and the preliminary cause of the shoot-out appears to be a monetary dispute, said the police.

articles.title: 'Shouldn’t get…,' Tharoor warns as India overtakes UK as 5th largest economy
articles.description: India has a population 20 times that of the UK and therefore its GDP per capita is lower.

articles.title: Will get you booted into prison: BJP MLA Arvind Limbavali tells woman activist
articles.description:
